actions.in_committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on National Parks and Recreation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Recreation

official_title: A bill to amend the National Parks and Recreation Act of 1978 to extend the time period during which the State of California may apply for certain grants for acquisition of lands and waters and development of essential public facilities in the Santa Monica Mountains Zone.

summary.text: Amends the National Parks and Recreation Act of 1978 to increase from five to ten years the time period between the Secretary of the Interior's approval of a comprehensive plan for the Santa Monica Mountains Zone and the time the State of California may apply for grants for land acquisition and public facility development in such Zone.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Parks and Recreation Act of 1978 to extend the time period during which the State of California may apply for certain grants for acquisition of lands and waters and development of essential public facilities in the Santa Monica Mountains Zone.
